QAPair.Question: What is (are) Inguinal hernia - discharge ?
QAPair.Answer: You or your child had surgery to repair an inguinal hernia caused by a weakness in the abdominal wall in your groin area. Now that you or your child is going home, follow the surgeon's instructions on self-care at home.

QAPair.Question: What is the outlook for Inguinal hernia - discharge ?
